review: I was very scared of extraction more so me being a CABG patient using blood thinners. Dr took care of preparation thoroughly after consulting cardiologist and deftly handled extraction with minimal pain and discomfort. Thanks so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am diabetic, initial plan given was to have 3 sittings for my root canal.

They chose to do It over 4 sittings and one additional visit( when I had gum pain)

Additional sitting and care was given and longer gaps for pain to subside and gums to heal.

They went above and beyond my expectations

Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
reply_text: I think we where in lockdown and not working since two months so I am surprised by this post which has happened a month ago but I guess nothing can be done as wearing a PPE suit with all accessories for every patient is a cost which is unavoidable thanks to covid ! Good standard of dentistry with a clean environment comes with a great cost which cannot be compromised at the alter of cost ! Patients and doctors lives matter !

tags: Value for money,
review: The doctor just removed the decayed tooth for my mum. It’s a full tooth and not a broken one. Just for removing a decayed tooth we paid Rs.2000 which is very very very costly. Though we asked the price for removing the tooth many times, the receptionist said they will tell after checking the tooth but was told only after removing it. This dental clinic is not affordable for middle class people.
reply_text: thank you for your feedback we value it!
